title: Myree's Chicken Madras
ingredients: ['700g chicken breast / thighs', '3 small green chillies', '5 tablespoons cooking oil', '3 cloves', '2 cardamom pods', '2 large onions, finely chopped', '2.5cm piece root ginger, finely chopped', '4 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 teaspoon red chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon turmeric', 'salt to taste', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes, pureed', 'handful coriander leaves', '1 teaspoon garam masala']
